thread.section_title: Road Cycle Exchange Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Road Cycle Exchange | roadcycleexchange.com
thread.title: Dennis
thread.title_full: Road Cycle Exchange reviewed by Dennis

author: Dennis
title: Dennis
text:
I purchased a Cervelo framset online from the team at Road Cycle Exchange. All communication was spot on even the questions I had asked via their website before I clicked the purchase button.
I popped down to their shop at Kingston upon Thames rather than have the frame sent to me. Again they were very friendly and even managed to up-sell some food (I was hungry) and a coffee whilst I waited on the framset being bubble wrapped for protection.
Friendly, good food, great experience.
